alert.note: Alert for Grundy; Kendall (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 5:03PM CDT until April 19 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR KENDALL AND NORTHEASTERN GRUNDY COUNTIES... At 503 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Plano, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Aurora, Joliet, Plainfield, Oswego, Yorkville, Channahon, Minooka, Plano, Sandwich, Montgomery, Boulder Hill, Newark, Millington, Millbrook, Lisbon, Plattville, Bristol and Little Rock. Including the following interstate... I-80 between mile markers 116 and 122. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
